metadata.title: CVE-2023-47235 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occurwhen a malformed BGP UPDATE message with an EOR is processed, because thepresence of EOR does not lead to a treat-as-withdraw outcome.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-47235` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
frr-pythontools - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
frr-snmp - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1-1ubuntu1.8').
